body:
Thanks,
I have a question; If we get rid of output, what would be the appropriate update we set to the op `SetShapeFn` in `tensorflow/core/kernels/io_ops.cc`, and also for the shape registration in 
`tensorflow/python/ops/io_ops.py` ?
